root.name: Victoria: Revolutions
root.description: Gameplay Additions Victoria Revolutions expands the original game's time frame from 1920 to 1936, bringing the end of this game to the starting date of another Paradox franchise, Hearts of IronAn in-game converter system to move your save games from Victoria to Hearts of Iron 2A new economic system wherein your capitalist type population units will improve your nation's infrastructure and industry independent of you, based on which political party is currently in power

similar_games.game: Europa Universalis III: Heir to the Throne
Hearts of Iron III: Semper Fi
